overview: Sana (Ilham Shaheen) discovers that her husband (Mahmoud Kabil) betrayed her, and travels to Sharm el-Sheikh and there she sees her husband with his mistress Safi, who later discovers that he is married to her customary, to decide to betray him with her new driver Magdy (Karim Abdel Aziz), and events develop
title: Madness of Life
